data.name: Devil May Cry 5 - Devil May Cry 5 Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
"Bang! Bang! Bang! Pull my Devil Trigger! ♪" You've got the Smokin' Sexy Stylish game, now jam along to the Smokin' Sexy Stylish soundtrack of Devil May Cry 5 wherever you go!

Featuring music from Devil May Cry 4 composer Kota Suzuki, with additional compositions by Hiromitsu Maeba, Yoshiya Terayama, John R. Graham, Casey Edwards, Steven McNair, Jeff Rona, and Cody Matthew Johnson and featuring performances by Ali Edwards, Cliff Lloret, Rachel Fannan, Shotaro Nakayama, Zhenlan Kang, and Daiki Umase.

The 288+ minute soundtrack has been re-authored from the original, high quality source material. Includes three high quality formats: MP3 (V0 bitrate), 16-bit FLAC and AAC.

Download size:

MP3: 821MB
FLAC: 2.09GB
AAC: 980MB

Soundtrack files can be found under the game's installation directory below:

\\Steam\steamapps\common\\Devil May Cry 5\SoundTrack

©CAPCOM CO., LTD.

-Tracklist-


Composers: Kota Suzuki, Hiromitsu Maeba, Yoshiya Terayama, John R. Graham, Casey Edwards, Steven McNair, Jeff Rona, Cody Matthew Johnson
Vocalists: Ali Edwards, Cliff Lloret, Rachel Fannan
Lyricists: Casey Edwards, Ali Edwards, Rachel Fannan
Drums: Shotaro Nakayama
Choir: Zhenlan Kang
Guitar: Daiki Umase

data.short_description: "Bang! Bang! Bang! Pull my Devil Trigger! ♪" You've got the Smokin' Sexy Stylish game, now jam along to the Smokin' Sexy Stylish soundtrack of Devil May Cry 5 wherever you go!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, AMD FX™-6300, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: *Xinput support Controllers recommended *Internet connection required for game activation. (Network connectivity uses Steam® developed by Valve® Corporation.)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770, AMD FX™-9590, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 6GB VRAM, AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 8GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: *Xinput support Controllers recommended *Internet connection required for game activation. (Network connectivity uses Steam® developed by Valve® Corporation.)

data.drm_notice:
Denuvo Anti-tamper
5 different PC within a day machine activation limit

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: This game contains strong langauge, violence and nudity.
